title: How to describe the main function of the plasma membrane - Quora

response.answer_text: The plasma membrane basically gives shape to a cell as well as protects that cell from its external surroundings. it is possible to see the plasma membrane through a regular or electron microscope.

protection of the cell and giving shape, maintaining osmotic pressure so that cells dont shrink or burst due to water, transportation of nutrients into cells and expulsion of wastes. antigen presentation.
